attributes.action: Introduce a box on voting form saying "none of the above"
attributes.additional_details: A huge majority of people within the UK have never voted in their lives. I believe this is due in large part to not finding any political party suitable due to their beliefs or their agenda. How many people would vote if their was a box saying "none of the above" as an option. I certainly would!... What happens thereafter is something we need to agree as a country for the good of humanity.
